title: 149M logins exposed in unsecured database, inc 900k Apple accounts
full_text: 149M logins exposed in unsecured database, inc 900k Apple accounts. A database containing 149 million account logins has been found sitting unsecured on a cloud service. The records include 900,000 usernames and passwords for Apple accounts. It was discovered by the same security researcher who found a similar database of ….
